name: Successfully create a new book

testSteps.description: 1: Successfully create a new book ({user_role=admin, title=The Great Gatsby})

children.description: Given I am a admin user
When I send a POST request to create a new book with title "The Great Gatsby" and author "F. Scott Fitzgerald"

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Set-Cookie: JSESSIONID=8B8D54DC39B5B18E103556F5E28D73BE; Path=/; HttpOnly
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Tue, 07 Jan 2025 04:55:05 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60
Connection: keep-alive

children.description: Then the response status code should be 201
And the response should contain the book details with title "The Great Gatsby" and author "F. Scott Fitzgerald"

title: Successfully create a new book

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I am a <user_role> user
When I send a POST request to create a new book with title "<title>" and author "F. Scott Fitzgerald"
Then the response status code should be 201
And the response should contain the book details with title "<title>" and author "F. Scott Fitzgerald"
